entry.title: English Vocabulary

Alike

  2. every one vs everyone, every thing vs everything, etc.

entry.content:
Things on this page are fragmentary and immature notes/thoughts of the author. It is not meant to readers but rather for convenient reference of the author and future improvement.

  1. beneficiary

  2. perfunctory

Alike

  1. bimonthly vs semimonthly

  2. every one vs everyone, every thing vs everything, etc.

  3. numeric vs numerical

Culture

chicken: white meant -> breast, dark meat -> leg

entry.title: Grammar Mistake
entry.summary:
Things on this page are fragmentary and immature notes/thoughts of the author. It is not meant to readers but rather for convenient reference of the author and future improvement.

  1. I'm on vocation and will answer you email when I'm back to office.

  2. I'm on vocation and will answer your …
entry.content:
Things on this page are fragmentary and immature notes/thoughts of the author. It is not meant to readers but rather for convenient reference of the author and future improvement.

  1. I'm on vocation and will answer you email when I'm back to office.

  2. I'm on vocation and will answer your email when I'm back to office.

  3. I'm on vacation and will answer your email when I'm back to office.

  4. I'm on vacation and will answer your email when I'm back in the office.
